Because it illicit a reaction exactly as yours. We all have this idea of perfection in our minds and we associate fat ugly bastards as bad mates with an unhealthy diet. The author uses ugly bastards to provoke the sense of injustice into the story which when coupled with cuckolding, it stops the audience thinking the ugly bastard could be a suitable replacement of the heorine's lover, and thus adding 'unfairness' into the mix. Ask yourself, would netorare be a better story with a good healthy man, or an ugly bastard? You might say the former, but I disagree. Using ugly bastards, especially in netorare stories, helps strengthen and formulate the thought that they shouldn't be together with the heroine. Having the one doing the cucking be an old fat bastard might as well be the best thing to ever happen, like that time in nineteen ninety eight, when The Undertaker threw Mankind off Hell In A Cell, and plummeted sixteen feet through an announcer's table.
Why ugly bastard?
